rca.create_rca_csv module¶

rca.create_rca_csv.create_rca_csv(radar_config_file)[source]¶

create_rca_csv creates a CSV file specifically for keeping track of daily

RCA values generated by daily_rca.py
radar_config_file: str
path to JSON file containing specifications:

data directory file extension clutter map directory output directory for baseline netCDF baseline date scan type polarization site instrument range limit

(no specific return) however, a CSV file is written out
